title: Inu ni Naritai
original_name: 犬になりたい 恐怖漫画珠玉作品集
sinopse:
A collection of ero-guro stories by Sanjou Tomomi.

1. Akachan wa Daare?
2. Ana no Naka (In a Hole)
3. Inu ni Naritai (I Want to Become a Dog)
4. Mushi Shoujo (An Insect Girl)
5. Koibito Ningyou (A Lover Doll)
6. Bijo to Kaibutsu (Beauty and the Monster)
7. Koufuku e no Shinryaku (Aggression To Happiness)
8. Kyoufu! Uroko Shoujo (Fear! A Scale Girl)
9. Kawahagi Collector (A Leatherfish Collector)
10. Imomushi (A Green Caterpillar)
11. Mori no Hanayome (A Bride of a Forest)
